title: Innovative Strategies for Elementary Mathematics Education Using Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Innovative elementary mathematics pedagogy course for pre-service teachers and education enthusiasts, exploring blended learning models in response to post-pandemic educational changes

learning_goals: The elementary mathematics curriculum can be redesigned in a blended learning environment
Learner engagement can be improved by over 30% through the use of digital tools and formative assessment techniques
Three or more family-involved mathematics learning activities can be developed and applied
Concept explanation efficiency can be improved by 40% through the production and utilization of educational videos
Two small-scale collaborative learning scenarios can be optimized and implemented for mobile environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
